title: Editorial and News – Reuters Online Support
text:
Editorial and News

www.reuters.com (http://www.reuters.com/) Visit Reuters news website for fast, accurate and comprehensive coverage of national, regional and international events. Reuters news operations are staffed by 2,300 text, photo and video journalists based in 192 bureaus. Curious for more? Visit Reuters Blogs: (http://blogs.reuters.com/us/) Editors Blogs (http://blogs.reuters.com/reuters-editors/) Photographers Blogs (http://blogs.reuters.com/photo/) Readers Feedback (http://blogs.reuters.com/gbu/) Submit Editorial Feedback (http://reuters.zendesk.com/anonymous_requests/new)
